movies.title: Padmaavat
movies.desc: Set in medieval India, Padmaavat tells the tale of Rani Padmavati, known for her beauty, intellect, and valor. When Alauddin Khilji hears of her, he becomes obsessed and launches a war to capture her. The story is a grand depiction of honor, sacrifice, and pride.

movies.title: Bajirao Mastani
movies.desc: A sweeping historical romance based on the real-life love story of Peshwa Bajirao I and his second wife Mastani. The film showcases their passionate love, cultural conflicts, and the political turmoil that challenges their bond.

movies.title: Ramleela (Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-Leela)
movies.desc: A modern-day Romeo and Juliet set in a violent, lawless land where love blooms between two young people from rival clans. Ramleela is a visually stunning saga of love, revenge, and tragedy.
